phew just spent a couple of hours trying to get this to work. 

firstly, lots of thanks and kudos to NitrogenUA for uploading and assistance on his torrent threads. otherwise will probably be at it for days.

anyway, here's what i've done to get this to work

- started on 3.90 m33
- upgraded to 5.0 m33-6
- upgraded to 6.39 me-4
- changed ISO setting to NP9660

then played like a charm. not saying mine's the only way that works, could be other 'paths' that would work as well.

thanks again!

haider95, you tried both - patched and unpatched versions?
Try setting 'Sony NP9660' UMD mode via VSH menu and/or increase your CPU clock up to 333. Here is an example of VSH menu which you usually get upon pressing Select while in XMB.
http://psp-download-center.com/members/advanced/img/25557_vshmenu.jpg

brucelipp, there are couple versions uploaded here on TPB, none of them worked for you?
http://thepiratebay.org/search/PSP%20Ys%20Seven/0/99/0

tapoq2, basically, patched version is for older firmwares like 5.03 GEN + Prometheus or 5.50 GEN + Prometheus. Since newer firmwares can play latest games by default there is no point in patching them. So i'd personally recommend you to use not patched iso for maximum compatibility. Though, in most cases patched ISOs work fine on both old and new firmwares. In the end, it's up to you, which one to use.
